name: Samo JSC
description: TheBank.vn is an online platform connecting thousands of brokers online. Originated in Vietnam, we aim to help million of people in South East Asia compare thousands of personal financial products and connect consumers with services providers (both individual brokers as well as financial institutions). 6 months after launch, we have acquired to-date October over 4,000 consultants/brokers from 72 financial institutions in Vietnam.
